mapper.select: SELECT B.BNO, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.CNT, B.BDATE, B.WRITER, B.CNO, C.CNAME, C.SNAME FROM BOARD B, CATEGORY C WHERE B.CNO = C.CNO ORDER BY BNO DESC
SELECT B.BNO, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.CNT, B.BDATE, B.WRITER, B.CNO, C.CNAME, C.SNAME FROM BOARD B, CATEGORY C WHERE B.CNO = C.CNO AND C.CNAME = #{cName} AND C.SNAME = #{sName} ORDER BY BNO DESC
SELECT B.BNO, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.CNT, B.BDATE, B.WRITER, B.CNO, C.CNAME, C.SNAME FROM BOARD B, CATEGORY C WHERE B.CNO = C.CNO AND B.BNO = #{bNo} ORDER BY BNO DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(BNO),0)+1 FROM BOARD
INSERT INTO BOARD ( BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, CNT, BDATE, WRITER, CNO ) VALUES ( #{bNo}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, SYSDATE, #{writer}, #{cNo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, CNO = #{cNo} WHERE BNO = #{bNo}
